name: edocs-av
description: Wrapper for the sfab bc AV workers project; this allows polling of AWS step activities for AV jobs

scripts.test/unit:cover: NODE_ENV=test npm run test/unit && nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.test/int: NODE_ENV=test nyc --x lib/_legacy --x test/ mocha -b --colors --reporter spec "./test/int/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test/int:cover: NODE_ENV=test npm run test/int && nyc report --reporter=lcov
